about_the_game:
Featuring a wide variety of cosmetics for your dinosaurs, The Prehistoric Legacy Collection has everything from jungle camouflage to wild model mutations!

This DLC pack contains ~200 different items across several dino classes! These include skins previously only available during time-limited special events, a large selection of taunts, classic styles from the original Primal Carnage, along with customizations for the more recently added Ceratosaurus and Pachycephalosaurus.

Complete Item List:

  • Precursor Rex (premium)
  • TZADIA Rex (mutation)
  • SPICATUS Rex (mutation)
  • GRACILUS Nova (mutation)
  • GIGAS Acro (mutation)
  • TARBOSUS Rex (mutation)

subs.option_text: Primal Carnage: Extinction - Prehistoric Legacy Collection DLC - $12.99

package_groups.title: Buy Primal Carnage: Extinction - Prehistoric Legacy DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz+ Single-Core CPU
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0GHz+ Multi-Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space

short_description: Deck out your dinosaurs with over 200 unique looks!
